query.sfwSql: Select * from sgt_benefit_dro_application a inner join sgt_plan b on a.plan_id=b.plan_id inner join sgt_person c on a.member_perslink_id=c.person_id
Select * from sgt_plan where (benefit_type_value='RETR'or benefit_type_value='DEFF') and plan_id not in(21,8) order by SORT_ORDER
Select * from sgt_Person_account (nolock) where person_id = @person_id and Plan_id = @plan_id and plan_participation_status_value in ('ENL1', 'SUS2','ENL3','SUS1')and end_date is null
Select * from SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION where LETTER_SENT_488_DAYS_FLAG='Y' AND LETTER_SENT_503_DAYS_FLAG='Y' AND (LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG='N' OR LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG IS NULL)

Select * from SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION where LETTER_SENT_488_DAYS_FLAG='Y' AND (LETTER_SENT_503_DAYS_FLAG='N' or LETTER_SENT_503_DAYS_FLAG IS NULL) AND (LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG='N' OR LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG IS NULL)

Select * from SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION where (LETTER_SENT_488_DAYS_FLAG='N' or LETTER_SENT_488_DAYS_FLAG IS NULL) AND (LETTER_SENT_503_DAYS_FLAG='N' or LETTER_SENT_503_DAYS_FLAG IS NULL) AND (LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG='N' OR LETTER_SENT_18_MONTHS_FLAG IS NULL)

SELECT A.* FROM SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION A(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PERSON_ACCOUNT B(NOLOCK) ON A.PLAN_ID=B.PLAN_ID AND A.MEMBER_PERSLINK_ID=B.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_CALCULATION C (NOLOCK) ON A.DRO_APPLICATION_ID=C.DRO_APPLICATION_ID WHERE B.PLAN_PARTICIPATION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('ENL1', 'SUS2','ENL3','SUS1', 'RTRD', 'DSD1', 'DSW1') --PIR 13736 - PLAN STAUSES 'RTRD', 'DSD1', 'DSW1' ADDED ALONG WITH DATAFIX AND A.DRO_STATUS_VALUE='QLFD' AND A.BENEFIT_RECEIPT_DATE <= @NEXTPAYMENTDATE AND (C.PAYMENT_STATUS_VALUE ='PEND' OR C.DRO_CALCULATION_ID IS NULL)

DECLARE @PAYMENTDATE DATETIME SELECT @PAYMENTDATE = max(PAYMENT_DATE) FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'PRCD' AND SCHEDULE_TYPE_VALUE = 'MTLY' set @PAYMENTDATE = Dateadd(m,1,@PAYMENTDATE)
SELECT * FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT ACCT (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_APPLICATION APP (NOLOCK) ON ACCT.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = APP.MEMBER_PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE ACCT.PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID = @PERSONID AND APP.PLAN_ID = @PLANID AND APP.ACTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','DENI') AND ACCT.ACCOUNT_RELATION_VALUE = 'MEMB' AND ACCT.BENEFIT_ACCOUNT_TYPE_VALUE = 'RETR' AND PAS.STATUS_VALUE = 'RECV' AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = ACCT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC )
Select * from sgt_Person_account (nolock) where person_id = @personid and Plan_id = @planid and plan_participation_status_value in ('RTRD')

UPDATE BDA SET status_value='PRCD', MODIFIED_BY='PERSLink Batch'+' '+ convert(nvarchar,@batchscheduleid), MODIFIED_DATE = GETDATE(), UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 from sgt_benefit_dro_application BDA inner join ( Select pa.dro_application_id from sgt_payee_Account PA inner join sgt_payment_history_header PHH on PA.payee_account_id=phh.payee_account_id and phh.payment_schedule_id=@paymentscheduleid where phh.payee_account_id is not null ) as PBDA on BDA.dro_application_id=PBDA.dro_application_id where isnull(status_value,'') <> 'PRCD'

SELECT BDA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID, CAST(ISNULL(MP.PERSON_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + ISNULL(MP.LAST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MP.FIRST_NAME,'') AS MEMBER_PERSLINK_NAME, CAST(ISNULL(AP.PERSON_ID,'') AS VARCHAR) + ' ' + ISNULL(AP.LAST_NAME,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(AP.FIRST_NAME,'') AS ALTERNATE_PAYEE_PERSLINK_NAME, DROMODEL.[DESCRIPTION] AS DRO_MODEL_DESCRIPTION, P.PLAN_NAME,DATE_OF_DIVORCE,RECEIVED_DATE,APPROVED_DATE,QUALIFIED_DATE,DROSTATUS.[DESCRIPTION] AS DRO_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, STATUSDESC.[DESCRIPTION] AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION, TOBRC.[DESCRIPTION] AS TIME_OF_BENEFIT_RECEIPT_CALC_DESCRIPTION, BDA.BENEFIT_RECEIPT_DATE, BDO.[DESCRIPTION] AS BENEFIT_DURATION_OPTION_DESCRIPTION, ISNULL(BDC.MONTHLY_BENEFIT_AMOUNT,0) AS MONTHLY_BENEFIT_AMOUNT,PT.[DESCRIPTION] AS PAYMENT_TYPE_VALUE,PS.[DESCRIPTION] AS PAYMENT_STATUS_VALUE,BDC.BENEFIT_BEGIN_DATE FROM SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_APPLICATION BDA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PLAN_ID=BDA.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_BENEFIT_DRO_CALCULATION BDC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BDA.DRO_APPLICATION_ID = BDC.DRO_APPLICATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) DROMODEL ON DROMODEL.CODE_ID=BDA.DRO_MODEL_ID AND DROMODEL.CODE_VALUE=BDA.DRO_MODEL_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) DROSTATUS ON DROSTATUS.CODE_ID=BDA.DRO_STATUS_ID AND DROSTATUS.CODE_VALUE=BDA.DRO_STATUS_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) STATUSDESC ON STATUSDESC.CODE_ID=BDA.STATUS_ID AND STATUSDESC.CODE_VALUE=BDA.STATUS_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) TOBRC ON TOBRC.CODE_ID=BDA.TIME_OF_BENEFIT_RECEIPT_CALC_ID AND TOBRC.CODE_VALUE=BDA.TIME_OF_BENEFIT_RECEIPT_CALC_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) BDO ON BDO.CODE_ID=BDA.BENEFIT_DURATION_OPTION_ID AND BDO.CODE_VALUE=BDA.BENEFIT_DURATION_OPTION_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) PT ON PT.CODE_ID=BDC.PAYMENT_TYPE_ID AND PT.CODE_VALUE=BDC.PAYMENT_TYPE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE(NOLOCK) PS ON PS.CODE_ID=BDC.PAYMENT_STATUS_ID AND PS.CODE_VALUE=BDC.PAYMENT_STATUS_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON (NOLOCK) MP ON MP.PERSON_ID = BDA.MEMBER_PERSLINK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGT_PERSON (NOLOCK) AP ON AP.PERSON_ID = BDA.ALTERNATE_PAYEE_PERSLINK_ID
